data.text: 1/8 As #HongKong’s home carrier, we provide important passenger and cargo connections to and from our #HK hub. In light of #COVID_19, and governments' travel restrictions, we will reduce capacity by 96% across our passenger network in April and May. https://t.co/49tKBlebfF

data.text: @sillylittlet Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@JLallysmith HI Janet, we are offering waiver on rebooking and refund fees for tickets issued before 17March for travel dates before 31May. https://t.co/2lFX7WZEW8
@trm2305 @hkairport Hi Tom, quarantine is not required for transit passengers if they remain in the restricted areas.
@Baudetvertaald Please share their eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Lucidavis86 Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@JordanYoung91 Hi Jordan, yes you may transit through HK if you remain in the airport restricted area. Please check out our travel restriction page here for details https://t.co/HZNT2LCfo5

data.text: @pmyacl Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?

@_geegee Hi Georgia, we are offering free and unlimited changes to all new tickets issued between 9 March and 20 April 2020. Perhaps this might be suitable for you. You may find out more here https://t.co/D6pRvy9Sll
@Sybbelles Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@LHRCDGTXL Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@paowong1 Hi there. Passengers is not included for quarantine in Hong Kong if transit only. - Anna
@inramana Hi Ramana, would you mind to DM us your email address, so that we can check -Elsa
@MichaelTozer Hi Michael, would you mind to DM us your booking reference, so that we can check -Elsa

@30minly Hi there. In view of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, and the subsequent drop in market demand, there will be significant short-term reductions – approximately 65% of our capacity – across our network for March and April. Hope for understanding. - Anna

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @pikdig Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through PM for checking please? Thank you.  - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@nicolafoote Hi there. Passengers will not be quarantined in Hong Kong if transit only. Thanks. - Anna
@ormir Hi there. Mind providing us your full name through PM for verify and the date you would like to amend?  - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@milton_roz007 Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number, full name and email address through PM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Ben_Ent Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Karianne Hi Karianne, may we know if you would like to cancel the booking? We are able to offer you a full refund -Elsa
@Jaynem7012 Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@inramana Hi Ramana, if you have already cancel the booking, it will take around 6-8 weeks to process the refund -Elsa
@kimmykime Hi Kimmy, would you mind to DM us you booking reference, so that we can check for you -Elsa
@pstebbings Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can further assist? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@darthchilli Mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@samwingerter Hi Samuel, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Joy https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Karianne Hi Karianne, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Joy https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Lubielou87 Hi there. If your ticket is purchased from travel agent, unfortunately we are unable to handle here on our end and you will need to contact them for follow up. Hope for understanding. - Anna
@Aramisamu Since your ticket was issued by a third party, please contact them to reschedule your flights. - Chloe
@charanya1391 We've replied you in DM. - Chloe
@stevevan Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@SinnyCheung Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ron_jodie Hi there. Mind providing us more details of your enquiry through DM see if we can provide assist? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@janico84 Hi there. We replied in DM. Thank you. - Anna
@tsekityam Hi there, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@VenetiaSarah Hi Venetia, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Given #COVID19, travel restrictions may change at short notice. Stay informed:
Flight status: https://t.co/MGv1WBlUgb
Restrictions: https://t.co/VNTFhHotPq
Refunds & ticket changes: https://t.co/rs2RIuidL7
Arrival in HK: https://t.co/J58GKNlczq
Others: https://t.co/FT35igWaoN https://t.co/4CYVVSkXc5

@BishtArchita Hi, please provide us the actual dimensions (LxWxH) and total weight of the TV so we can place a request for you. Pre-approval is needed, otherwise you may be rejected to check it in. Meanwhile, even if it is approved, it is still subject to excess baggage fee
 -Ella
@hendrik_dev Hi Hendrik, please check our travel restrictions page here for more details based on your destination. https://t.co/HZNT2LCfo5
@CumminsAllOver Please rebook before your original departure date - Holly
@cfpretorius Hi there, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name, 13-digit eTicket number and email address that you made the booking so we can have a look?- Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@SinnyCheung Hi Sinny, you may check our refund and rebooking policy here https://t.co/2lFX7WZEW8
@Chloe_Wheeler Hi Chloe, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@intotheEnd Hi Eddie, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@tvparcable Hi there, we have responded to you via DM.
@delianewman101 Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@Saartjie_Hall06 Hi there, we received your private message and replied you there. :) -Ella
@AimeeHillivon Hi Aimee, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@JohnMho Hi John, can you inbox us with your enquiry and 13-digit eTicket number + passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@AnnaBannister9 Hi there, mind DM us your email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ameliaw_b Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@summit_goel @cathaypacificIN @cathaypacificTH Hi there, as your ticket was issued by the third party, you are advised to check with your issuing agency. Thanks for your understanding! - Holly
@thomsonionioni Hi David, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly
@annekedmh Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Twiggystick2 Hi Rebecca, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name, 13-digit eTicket number and register email address so we can have a look? -Joy https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@hmv207x Hi there, mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@SuryaSpencer @cathaypacificIN @cathaypacifichk Mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Peter_Tix If you hold a new card / account in the same bank, the amount will be credited to the new card / account directly. If you do no  have a new card / account in the same bank, please DM us. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@mattyjstock Congratulations on engagement! I'm afraid that you may check with airport team.-Vinci

Along with cleaning measures taken in between each flight, upon a confirmed case of #COVID19 on our aircraft, professionals implement a 5-hour deep clean. Out of an abundance of caution for our customers and crew, every area is disinfected thoroughly. Watch how. https://t.co/ddZc2AYhTV

data.text:
@summit_goel @cathaypacificIN @cathaypacificTH Hi there, since your ticket was issued by the third party, you are advised to check with your issuing agency. Thanks for your understanding! 
- Liz
@2Chanz Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@joie168 Hi there, we are sorry to hear your disappointment! Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@paul_wghtman Hi there, since your ticket was issued by third party, we are unable to amend on our end. Please contact your issuing agency for further assistance. Thanks for your understanding! - Liz
@FrancescoSEA You may check with the local embassy for the requirement details of the medical certificate. Thanks for your understanding. - Liz

@FrancescoSEA Yes, for Nepal, Hk citizens will require to submit a recently issued medical certificate which states of customers not being infected by COVID-19 when applying for regular visa.  You may check here for more details: https://t.co/B3esr286AP  - Liz
